hero.title: Storage Rental Process
hero.subtitle: Explore our complete guide to self-storage, full-service storage, and other ASMS services.

steps.title: Simplify your life in 3 easy steps
steps.subtitle: Transform your living space. Renting storage is easy with ASMS!

items.title: Book your storage unit
items.desc: You can book online or contact us via email, hotline, or message to discuss your needs and get a quote.

items.title: We pick up your items
items.desc: On schedule, we collect your belongings and deliver them to our clean, safe facility. You can visit your storage anytime.

items.title: Retrieve anytime you want
items.desc: ASMS will return your items whenever you need. With self-storage, you have 24/7 unlimited access.

size.title: Unsure about the right storage size?
size.subtitle: Check our detailed guide to find the most suitable size for your needs!

review.text: “I used ASMS storage while renovating my house. The team packed, transported, and returned everything easily. Great service and friendly staff!”
review.author: Hanh Ho

items.title: Managed by Vietnamese
items.desc: ASMS is operated by experienced managers experienced and customer oriented managers, ensuring world-class service quality.

items.title: We care about your needs
items.desc: Our goal is to deliver optimized solutions to expand your living and working space.

contact.title: Have any questions?
contact.subtitle: Reach out to ASMS for quick support via email, hotline, or message.

review.title: What our customers say
review.text: I used ASMS storage while renovating my house. The staff packed, delivered and returned my items conveniently — very friendly and professional!
review.author: Hanh Ho
